sentences.en: At the same time , the consumption of durable goods increased greatly in the countryside.
sentences.cn: 农村居民购买耐用消费品的数量迅速增加.

sentences.en: Bone china is strong and durable.
Durable repelleuts are used mainly in apparel, household fabrics and militery good.
sentences.cn: 永久性的防护剂主要用于衣服, 家用织物和军用品.

sentences.en: Extenders are durable water repellents which lower the overall cost of the finish.
sentences.cn: 增补剂系永久性的防护剂,它降低整理剂的总价格.

sentences.en: Foreign satin cloth , solid ribs . It's durable and handsome for rainy days or clear.
sentences.cn: 洋缎面子, 实心骨子,晴天,落雨,耐用好看!

sentences.en: Gold and silver are of a more durable nature.
sentences.cn: 金银具有较大的耐久性.

sentences.en: I thought they'd be a nice durable cardboard.
sentences.cn: 我起先还以为大概是好看的空书壳子.

sentences.en: Made of polyurethane and nylon, they are durable for tough chewers.
sentences.cn: 由聚氨酯和尼龙材质, 适合强悍咬合力的狗狗.

sentences.en: Others are relatively stable and durable.
sentences.cn: 其它的则相当稳定和经久.

sentences.en: The durable high-impact plastic case is water resistant to 100 feet.
sentences.cn: 这种结实的高强度塑料盒子在水下100英尺以内是防水的。

sentences.en: They chose to concentrate on simpler and more durable hardware.
sentences.cn: 他们选择加强更简单牢固的武器.

sentences.en: They frequently require more major durable purchases.
sentences.cn: 他们经常需要购买耐用消费品.

sentences.en: This raincoat is made of very durable material.
sentences.cn: 这件雨衣是用非常耐用的料子做的.

sentences.en: This varnish provides a durable finish.
sentences.cn: 这种清漆可作耐久的罩面漆.

trans.tran_en: staying in good condition for a long time, even if used a lot
